alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 5:03PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lafayette and Taylor Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 502 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Perry, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Pinland, Jug Island, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Howell Place, Secotan, Boyd, Smith, Carbur and Adams Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
